name: Delete playlist with null ID → Expect 400 Bad Request
description: Validates server response when deleting a playlist with a null ID.
descriptionHtml: Validates server response when deleting a playlist with a null ID.
statusTrace:
java.lang.AssertionError: 
Expected: a string containing "playlist id"
     but: was "{
  "error": {
    "status": 400,
    "message": "Only valid bearer authentication supported"
  }
}"
